meanings.definition: A sugar produced by the breakdown of starch, used in brewing and as a sweetener.
meanings.sent1: The maltose added a sweet taste to the beer.
meanings.sent2: I used maltose to make my cookies sweeter.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf sprinkled maltose on the gingerbread house.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as infectious as maltose spreading through a batch of dough.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of maltose filled the kitchen, making everyone crave something sweet.

meanings.definition: A disaccharide consisting of two glucose molecules.
meanings.sent1: The body breaks down maltose into glucose for energy.
meanings.sent2: Maltose is formed when two glucose molecules combine.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy seemed to have a maltose rush after eating too many treats.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was as strong as the bond between the two glucose molecules in maltose.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced on the surface of the maltose crystals, creating a beautiful sparkle.
